content: वृद्ध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वृध्-क्त] (<ab>compar.</ab> ज्यायस् or वर्षींयस्, <ab>superl.</ab> ज्येष्ठ or वर्षिष्ठ) {@--1@} Increased, augmented. {@--2@} Full grown, grown up. {@--3@} Old, aged, advanced in years; वृद्धास्ते न विचारणीयचरिताः <ls>U. 5. 35.</ls> {@--4@} Advanced or grown up (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>), <ab>cf.</ab> वयोवृद्ध, धर्मवृद्ध, ज्ञानवृद्ध, आगमवृद्ध &c. {@--5@} Great, large. {@--6@} Accumulated, heaped. {@--7@} Wise, learned. --द्धः {@--1@} An old man; हैयंगवीनमादाय घोषवृद्धानुपस्थितान् <ls>R. 1. 5</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 78</ls>; <ls>Me. 30.</ls> {@--2@} A worthy or venerable man. {@--3@} A sage, saint. {@--4@} A male descendant. --द्धं {@--1@} Benzoin. {@--2@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A word having a Vṛddhi vowel in the first syllable, as आ, ऐ and औ.
